subject: Baseball
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Center fielder Mike Cameron, 39, told the Washington Nationals that he was retiring after a 17-year career in which he won three Gold Gloves and averaged 22 homers over an 11-year stretch.
snippet: Center fielder Mike Cameron, 39, told the Washington Nationals that he was retiring after a 17-year career in which he won three Gold Gloves and averaged 22 homers over an 11-year stretch.
